name: lambda-rie-test
description: Lambda RIE test with OpenTelemetry instrumentation

scripts.test:full: npm run build && npm run start && sleep 3 && npm run invoke && npm run stop
scripts.invoke: curl -s -X POST http://localhost:9000/2015-03-31/functions/function/invocations -d @event.json | jq '.' && npm run check
scripts.check: docker compose logs lambda-rie | grep -E '(REQUEST HOOK|RESPONSE HOOK|ESM handler successfully patched|spanId)' | tail -10 || echo '⚠️  No trace logs found yet. Try: npm run logs'
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
